title: Cocolors
synopsis: There is a world in which an endless rain of dark ash fills the sky, and covers the earth. Humanity, fearing the ash that burns and melts away human flesh, had no choice but to cover themselves in protective suits, and their faces with gigantic masks. Bundled up in their suits and hidden away behind their masks, the people have fled deep within the underground. This is the story of the children growing up in this fearful world. (Source: Official site)
background: Cocolors was first screened at Machi Asobi vol. 17 on October 9, 2016, as a live dubbing event. It was later completed as a full package film with its own audio track, which premiered at Machi Asobi vol. 18 on May 5, 2017.Winner of the Excellence Award on the 21st Japan Media Arts Festival.
